name: core-typescript
description: Root package for the pnpm monorepo

scripts.build: pnpm --recursive --filter "./packages/**" run build && pnpm --filter "./apps/**" run build
scripts.clean: find . -name node_modules -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name dist -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && rm -rf .pnpm-store
